## SpeakLocale.lang property

language\[-script\]\[-region\] Where: - language: ISO 639 two-letter or three-letter code - script: ISO 15924 four-letter script code - region: ISO 3166 two-letter, uppercase code

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lang: string;
```
